DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether a new research medication is effective and safe for the treatment of acute stroke when given within 6 hours of the onset of stroke.
DOC.brief_title: A Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of CP-101,606 in Subjects With an Acute Stroke
DOC.criteria: Males & females age 4090 years Enrolled in study within 6 hours of onset of stroke symptoms Willing to sign informed consent form No significant disabilities prior to stroke Treatment with tPA (tissue plasminogen activator) Premorbid modified rankin scale score of 2 or more
